column4: Flannel many bit torrent sites have rss feeds..and you can put filters in to automatically get any torrents matching a certain name
azureus has such a feature, as well as utorrent
hey, umm.. how can I search for something like "start text UNKNOWN CHARS HERE + NEWLINES end text" in a string like "blah blah start text random stuff here end text blah blah blah" with regex?
of course. that is what regex' is made for.
